alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 27 at 11:58PM MDT until July 28 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM MDT THURSDAY THROUGH 10 PM MDT THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible, especially on burn scars and areas with already saturated soil. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Colorado and west central Colorado, including the following areas, in northwest Colorado, Flat Tops and Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus. In west central Colorado, Central Colorado River Basin, Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys, Grand and Battlement Mesas, Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide and West Elk and Sawatch Mountains. * WHEN...From 10 AM MDT Thursday through 10 PM MDT Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. In addition, heavy rainfall over recent burn scars such as the Grizzly Creek Fire, Lake Christine Fire, and Pine Gulch Fire burn areas, among other smaller, more recent burn areas in the watch area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Deep monsoonal moisture is forecast to spread northward Thursday with showers and thunderstorms likely with flooding possible over recent burn scars and already saturated soils from previous few days.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Central Colorado River Basin; Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
